name: POC_BP_INFO
description: Contains information concerning the benefit periods corresponding to the plan of care.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BP_MED_DIR_SER_ID
columns.description: The medical director listed on the benefit period's CTI.

columns.name: BP_ATT_PROV_SER_ID
columns.description: The attending provider listed on the benefit period's CTI.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PERIOD_NUM
columns.description: The number of this benefit period in the sequence of the patient's hospice care.
